data.text: @ryrein41 @CBCNL This is gold. Someone who claims to study misinformation who wants to completely ignore a scientific, factual report released by Pfizer. You’re the biggest hypocrite I’ve come across yet.

@ryrein41 @CBCNL Seems like you’re letting your personal beliefs of a certain group of people stop you from objectively evaluating scientific evidenced released from the vaccine maker. That’s gotta hurt.

@ryrein41 @CBCNL So you can’t answer a simple question. Have you read Pfizer’s data? Seems you’re the one with your head in the sand. What’s wrong? Don’t want to read something that contradicts your own beliefs/bias?

@JamesDa51321958 @CBCNL An individual who shares sources like Ezra Levant and Elon Musk, is an individual I've interacted with a thousand times over the past 2 years. A clone.

Don't let me hold you up from confirming your own biases - or from being horny on Twitter. You should get back to it!

@JamesDa51321958 @CBCNL As I have said, yes I have - I study misinformation. The interpretations you share and believe are flawed and incorrect.

Do you understand confirmation bias? You probably want to avoid this discussion, because it's hard to consider your beliefs could ever be wrong.
@ryrein41 @CBCNL What is wrong with you? I objectively read Pfizer’s own data. Have you read it?

@JamesDa51321958 @CBCNL How well do you understand confirmation bias then, and are you checking YOUR OWN beliefs to make sure you're not falling for that first?

You've obviously done nothing but confirm your pre-existing belief for the past 1-2 years, correct? Like all humans are prone to doing?

@ryrein41 @CBCNL Oh I’m well aware of the litany of misinformation. I don’t care about it because I can tell the difference between that and facts. The Pfizer report is fact and it’s jaw dropping that it was given the green light. Heads should roll.
